task.title: Removing package signatures
task.shortdesc: Describes how to remove all signatures from an Android package (APK).

step.cmd: If necessary, open the Signing and Keys view by selecting Window Show View Other and then selecting MOTODEV Studio Signing and Keys from the list of views. Note that this view is part of the MOTODEV Studio for Android perspective and is thus normally opened when you switch to that perspective.
In the Signing and Keys view click (Remove Package Signatures).
step.stepresult: The Package Signature Removal dialog appears.

step.cmd: Using the Packages folder field, specify the folder that contains the APK files (there can be more than one) from which the signatures are to be removed. This is often the dist directory within an Android application's project.
Under Select the packages, select the APK files that are to have their signatures removed.

result.p: A message confirms that the signature has been removed.
The signatures are removed from the selected APK files.
